analysis: The documents primarily concern the designation of officers to perform the duties of a Secretary of a department in the event of absence, sickness, resignation, or death of the Secretary and other principal officers. They establish the order of succession within various departments, including Agriculture, Interior, Treasury, Defense, State, Commerce, Labor, Navy, Air Force, Post Office, Homeland Security, and Health and Human Services. Many of the documents revoke previous executive orders on the same subject, updating the line of succession.
title: Departmental Leadership Succession
